text: suryan udayavelayil a guhayute valatubhagattekk marippeakunnatayum astamayasamayatt avare vittukatann itatteattupeakunnatayum ninakku kanam. avarea, guhakkakatt visalamaya oritattakunnu. it allahuvinre atayalannalil pettatan. allahu are nervaliyilakkunnuvea avanan sanmargam prapiccavan. avan are valiketilakkunnuvea avane nervaliyilakkunna oru raksakaneyum ninakku kantettanavilla
